author: amodakgit
body:
Following the proposal from RECO group, the data certification related Tau DQM code is now moved from **Validation/RecoTau** to  **DQMOffline/PFTau** package. The idea is to separate the genuine data certification code related to Tau DQM from mc validation which is in the Validation/RecoTau package. Common part of the data & mc code are kept in the DQMOffline/PFTau and will also be used by mc validation.
These changes have been approved by TauPOG and you can see the slides here for more details,
https://indico.cern.ch/event/565857/contributions/2285741/attachments/1328124/1994864/TauDQM_29Aug16.pdf

cc: @roger-wolf 

Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_1_X #15744 (original by @amodakgit).
title: Tau DQM code relocation from Validation/RecoTau area
